text: @GovRonDeSantis You can give #teachers a raise. You still lost their #vote. Your non #leadership for #floridians amidst #pandemic #COVID19 is deplorable. To think I voted for you. Makes me sick. #beaches look like #SPRINGBREAK you couldn’t follow @CDCgov guidelines. Go back to #phase1 correctly
